topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5451a2906368723a42a20000#post_5451a2906368723a42a20000
[bq="Twisty"]TIME FOR A HIP HOP STORY:

This story is about hip hop legend and survivor MF Grimm.

!http://api.ning.com/files/r0e5yM7iLi0qBtM2V6OauRsNZqH3zMbrF03naPjGN99aqOef*L53Zzykh-ayzmDuXajGuZMm9gZfnZkZ0pg5zixI4*zW2H1w/MFGrimmamd_percycarey.jpg!

MF Grimm has had a bad past, he was shot by a rival drug dealer 7 times and in the shooting, his half brother and manager Jay was killed, so most records labels cut contracts with Grimm after that, he entered a long Coma in which he managed to recover full vision, hearing, and speech ability, but was still forced to use a wheelchair.

One day in 2000 he was charged with posesion of narcotics and attempted conspiracy, he was sentenced to life imprisonment, Grimm paid a $100,000 bail for 1 last day (24 hours) free.

Trough this last 24 hours he quickly got to the studio, called all his rapper friends and together recorder what is considered one of the biggest underground rap album classics

!http://lh4.ggpht.com/_W5Y4NWr96ms/SXokUavA8fI/AAAAAAAAG3U/nIvr6sjLId0/mfgrimmibliys.jpg!

The Downfall of Ibliys: A Ghetto Opera.

After going to jail he spended his time studying law, then he proceeded to defend himself and managed to reduce his sentence to 5 years.[/bq]

>tfw a poor limbless rapper with 24 hours left of freedom managed to do more in a day than what you would do in your lifetime.
topics.author: 5154c5237f123bcd580002fc
